description: Creates a trail that specifies the settings for delivery of log data to an Amazon S3 bucket.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Specifies the name of the trail. The name must meet the following requirements: Contain only ASCII letters (a-z, A-Z), numbers (0-9), periods (.), underscores (_), or dashes (-) Start with a letter or number, and end with a letter or number Be between 3 and 128 characters Have no adjacent periods, underscores or dashes. Names like my-_namespace and my--namespace are not valid. Not be in IP address format (for example, 192.168.5.4)

parameters.name: S3BucketName
parameters.description: Specifies the name of the Amazon S3 bucket designated for publishing log files. For information about bucket naming rules, see Bucket naming rules in the Amazon Simple Storage Service User Guide.

parameters.name: EnableLogFileValidation
parameters.description: Specifies whether log file integrity validation is enabled. The default is false.

parameters.name: CloudWatchLogsLogGroupArn
parameters.description: Specifies a log group name using an Amazon Resource Name (ARN), a unique identifier that represents the log group to which CloudTrail logs will be delivered. You must use a log group that exists in your account. Not required unless you specify CloudWatchLogsRoleArn.

parameters.name: KmsKeyId
parameters.description: Specifies the KMS key ID to use to encrypt the logs delivered by CloudTrail. The value can be an alias name prefixed by alias/, a fully specified ARN to an alias, a fully specified ARN to a key, or a globally unique identifier. CloudTrail also supports KMS multi-Region keys. For more information about multi-Region keys, see Using multi-Region keys in the Key Management Service Developer Guide. Examples: alias/MyAliasName arn:aws:kms:us-east-2:123456789012:alias/MyAliasName arn:aws:kms:us-east-2:123456789012:key/12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012 12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012

parameters.name: TagsList
parameters.description: A list of tags. (dict) --- A custom key-value pair associated with a resource such as a CloudTrail trail, event data store, dashboard, or channel. The key in a key-value pair. The key must be must be no longer than 128 Unicode characters. The key must be unique for the resource to which it applies. Value (string) --- The value in a key-value pair of a tag. The value must be no longer than 256 Unicode characters.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key in a key-value pair. The key must be must be no longer than 128 Unicode characters. The key must be unique for the resource to which it applies.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value in a key-value pair of a tag. The value must be no longer than 256 Unicode characters.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Specifies the name of the trail.

nested_items.name: S3BucketName
nested_items.description: Specifies the name of the Amazon S3 bucket designated for publishing log files.

nested_items.name: S3KeyPrefix
nested_items.description: Specifies the Amazon S3 key prefix that comes after the name of the bucket you have designated for log file delivery. For more information, see Finding Your CloudTrail Log Files.

nested_items.name: SnsTopicName
nested_items.description: This field is no longer in use. Use SnsTopicARN.

nested_items.name: SnsTopicARN
nested_items.description: Specifies the ARN of the Amazon SNS topic that CloudTrail uses to send notifications when log files are delivered. The format of a topic ARN is:

nested_items.name: IncludeGlobalServiceEvents
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the trail is publishing events from global services such as IAM to the log files.

nested_items.name: IsMultiRegionTrail
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the trail exists in one Region or in all Regions.

nested_items.name: TrailARN
nested_items.description: Specifies the ARN of the trail that was created. The format of a trail ARN is:

nested_items.name: LogFileValidationEnabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether log file integrity validation is enabled.

nested_items.name: CloudWatchLogsLogGroupArn
nested_items.description: Specifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the log group to which CloudTrail logs will be delivered.

nested_items.name: CloudWatchLogsRoleArn
nested_items.description: Specifies the role for the CloudWatch Logs endpoint to assume to write to a user's log group.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: Specifies the KMS key ID that encrypts the events delivered by CloudTrail. The value is a fully specified ARN to a KMS key in the following format.

nested_items.name: IsOrganizationTrail
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the trail is an organization trail.
